## Description {#details}

Compute iterated dominance frontiers using a linear time algorithm.

The algorithm used here is based on:

Sreedhar and Gao. A linear time algorithm for placing phi-nodes. In Proceedings of the 22nd ACM SIGPLAN-SIGACT Symposium on Principles of Programming Languages POPL &#39;95. ACM, New York, NY, 62-73.

It has been modified to not explicitly use the DJ graph data structure and to directly compute pruned SSA using per-variable liveness information.

<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Determine the iterated dominance frontier, given a set of defining</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><Highlight kind="comment">/// In turn, the results can be used to place phi nodes.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This algorithm is a linear time computation of Iterated Dominance Frontiers,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The template parameters should be of a CFG block type.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Give the IDF calculator the set of blocks in which the value is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// defined.  This is equivalent to the set of starting blocks it should be</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Note: This set &#42;must&#42; live for the entire lifetime of the IDF calculator.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/idfcalculatorbase/#a9180c82ceffac7e5586cc2d6f368f996"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/idfcalculatorbase/#a9180c82ceffac7e5586cc2d6f368f996">setDefiningBlocks</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl">SmallPtrSetImpl&lt;NodeTy &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;Blocks) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Give the IDF calculator the set of blocks in which the value is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// live on entry to the block.   This is used to prune the IDF calculation to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// not include blocks where any phi insertion would be dead.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Note: This set &#42;must&#42; live for the entire lifetime of the IDF calculator.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/idfcalculatorbase/#a8efdd1ea3537e57552087a2767969557"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/idfcalculatorbase/#a8efdd1ea3537e57552087a2767969557">setLiveInBlocks</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl">SmallPtrSetImpl&lt;NodeTy &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;Blocks) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// calculator to not use liveness anymore.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Calculate iterated dominance frontiers</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This uses the linear-time phi algorithm based on DJ-graphs mentioned in</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// the file-level comment.  It performs DF-&gt;IDF pruning using the live-in</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// set, to avoid computing the IDF for blocks where an inserted PHI node</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// would be dead.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/idfcalculatorbase/#a714e5448566006046f747d9ec4df8241"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/idfcalculatorbase/#a714e5448566006046f747d9ec4df8241">calculate</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;NodeTy &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;IDFBlocks);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/idfcalculatordetail/childrengetterty/#a5f1b15474259d49fb4668ce85d797ab8"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/idfcalculatordetail/childrengetterty/#a5f1b15474259d49fb4668ce85d797ab8">ChildrenGetterTy&lt;NodeTy, IsPostDom&gt;::get</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/idfcalculatordetail/childrengetterty/#a3113fc68c6730a4814882980981a7e75">NodeRef</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NodeTy, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IsPostDom&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/idfcalculatorbase/#a714e5448566006046f747d9ec4df8241"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/idfcalculatorbase/#a714e5448566006046f747d9ec4df8241">IDFCalculatorBase&lt;NodeTy, IsPostDom&gt;::calculate</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;NodeTy &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;IDFBlocks) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Use a priority queue keyed on dominator tree level so that inserted nodes</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// are handled from the bottom of the dominator tree upwards. We also augment</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the level with a DFS number to ensure that the blocks are ordered in a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// deterministic way.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">DomTreeNodePair =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="normal">      std::pair&lt;DomTreeNodeBase&lt;NodeTy&gt; &#42;, std::pair&lt;unsigned, unsigned&gt;&gt;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">IDFPriorityQueue =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="normal">      std::priority&#95;queue&lt;DomTreeNodePair, SmallVector&lt;DomTreeNodePair, 32&gt;,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="normal">                          <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/less-second">less&#95;second</a>&gt;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="normal">  IDFPriorityQueue PQ;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="normal">  DT.updateDFSNumbers();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;DomTreeNodeBase&lt;NodeTy&gt;</a> &#42;, 32&gt; Worklist;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">SmallPtrSet&lt;DomTreeNodeBase&lt;NodeTy&gt;</a> &#42;, 16&gt; VisitedPQ;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">SmallPtrSet&lt;DomTreeNodeBase&lt;NodeTy&gt;</a> &#42;, 16&gt; VisitedWorklist;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (useLiveIn) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="normal">    VisitedPQ.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimplbase/#ae6450915b4be60dae8a3c11dc8fc95dc">reserve</a>(LiveInBlocks-&gt;size());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal">    VisitedWorklist.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimplbase/#ae6450915b4be60dae8a3c11dc8fc95dc">reserve</a>(LiveInBlocks-&gt;size());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NodeTy &#42;BB : &#42;DefBlocks)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/domtreenodebase">DomTreeNodeBase&lt;NodeTy&gt;</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a> = DT.getNode(BB)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal">      PQ.push(&#123;<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>, std::make&#95;pair(<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>-&gt;getLevel(), <a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>-&gt;getDFSNumIn())&#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="normal">      VisitedWorklist.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a9d834ae3da8c62c2b668dada51335eb0">insert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!PQ.empty()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="normal">    DomTreeNodePair RootPair = PQ.top();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="normal">    PQ.pop();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/domtreenodebase">DomTreeNodeBase&lt;NodeTy&gt;</a> &#42;Root = RootPair.first;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RootLevel = RootPair.second.first;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Walk all dominator tree children of Root, inspecting their CFG edges with</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// targets elsewhere on the dominator tree. Only targets whose level is at</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// most Root&#39;s level are added to the iterated dominance frontier of the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// definition set.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Worklist.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#ad9a3c7bc26b130377bbafc170b5f88a2">empty</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="normal">    Worklist.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(Root);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!Worklist.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#ad9a3c7bc26b130377bbafc170b5f88a2">empty</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/domtreenodebase">DomTreeNodeBase&lt;NodeTy&gt;</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a> = Worklist.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#a0c8ffe664a36e30d49c84d0aded2fe08">pop&#95;back&#95;val</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="normal">      NodeTy &#42;BB = <a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>-&gt;getBlock();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Succ is the successor in the direction we are calculating IDF, so it is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// successor for IDF, and predecessor for Reverse IDF.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DoWork = &#91;&amp;&#93;(NodeTy &#42;Succ) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/domtreenodebase">DomTreeNodeBase&lt;NodeTy&gt;</a> &#42;SuccNode = DT.getNode(Succ);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SuccLevel = SuccNode-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/domtreenodebase/#ab73bfd7dc4d5a446db965380e340810e">getLevel</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SuccLevel &gt; RootLevel)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!VisitedPQ.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a9d834ae3da8c62c2b668dada51335eb0">insert</a>(SuccNode).second)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="normal">        NodeTy &#42;SuccBB = SuccNode-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/domtreenodebase/#aab2bf365c9f4b976adc7479576dfd5bb">getBlock</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (useLiveIn &amp;&amp; !LiveInBlocks-&gt;count(SuccBB))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="normal">        IDFBlocks.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#a396fcfee6914c76974b73c3d203da6a5">emplace&#95;back</a>(SuccBB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!DefBlocks-&gt;count(SuccBB))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><Highlight kind="normal">          PQ.push(std::make&#95;pair(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><Highlight kind="normal">              SuccNode, std::make&#95;pair(SuccLevel, SuccNode-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/domtreenodebase/#a718717ee958956ec34ed177ef0b7f2ba">getDFSNumIn</a>())));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;Succ : ChildrenGetter.get(BB))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><Highlight kind="normal">        DoWork(Succ);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DomChild : &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (VisitedWorklist.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a9d834ae3da8c62c2b668dada51335eb0">insert</a>(DomChild).second)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><Highlight kind="normal">          Worklist.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(DomChild);</Highlight></CodeLine>
